definition: When the girl smiles, the matchmaker's job is half done. (idiom)
pinyin: shao4 nu:3 lu4 xiao4 lian3 , hun1 shi4 ban4 cheng2 quan2
containing_words.word: 少女露笑脸，婚事半成全

sentences.english: Weddings and funerals are the emotional events.
sentences.chinese: 婚事和丧事都是动感情的时候。

sentences.english: An auspicious day; referring to the date of a wedding.
sentences.chinese: 今天是不容错过的吉期，适于操办婚事。

sentences.english: Peng our headquarters will LeiJinYi brought home, want to let parents agree with their marriage.

sentences.english: In the beginning, the bride's parents opposed her mariage, but at end, we agreed to.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的爸妈反对这桩婚事，但最终还得同意了。

sentences.english: If water mentioned after the game he wants to give tang with Cheng Xi marriage.
sentences.chinese: 文若水提到比赛后便想给唐正和程曦婚事办了。

sentences.english: Today is an unmissable auspicious day, suitable for holding a wedding.
sentences.chinese: 今天是不容错过的吉期，适于操办婚事。

sentences.english: The King, her father, gave his consent.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰公主的父亲同意了这桩婚事。

sentences.english: As soon as they returned home, the marriage was concluded.
sentences.chinese: 他们回家后很快就办好了婚事。

sentences.english: Now when the noodles that wears the madam of Hou Ye begs a madam to help and backs this wedding.
sentences.chinese: 现下当着侯爷夫人的面，求夫人成全，退了这头婚事。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the bride's parents opposed her mariage, but at last, they agreed to.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的父母反对这桩婚事，但最终还是同意了。

sentences.english: Their daughter's wedding reception was sheer ostentation .
sentences.chinese: 他们女儿大办婚事纯然是为了炫耀。

sentences.english: The Green's spared no efforts on their daughter's wedding reception.
sentences.chinese: 格林夫妇不予余力地操办女儿的婚事。
父亲不同意我们俩人的婚事。

sentences.english: Their parents grudgingly assented to the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 他们的父母勉强同意了这桩婚事。

sentences.english: Marriage that night, cheng bite gold to draw up three chapters.
sentences.chinese: 婚事当晚，程咬金欲约法三章。

definition: variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
major turning point of lifelong import (esp. marriage)
to break a promise of marriage
to send the betrothal gifts/(fig.) to conclude a marriage
parents of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law/relatives by marriage
variant of 訂婚|订婚[ding4 hun1]
